title: Is heimdinger Op, or are people just bad at league
body:
I hate when people say that {{champion:74}} is over powered, even know that people just dive you, and dive you and just keep on feeding you Willy Wonka giving t free chocolate yelling "Kane West 2020!" as he explodes the chocolate factory. (this is my thoughts, by the way) Lets talk early game, (until level 6) his turrets aren't that strong and so are his missile, making it easy for him to feed, or just hope he is mid lane and your playing {{champion:157}}  Heim ults, use your wind wall.

What do you think is heim Op, or are people just bad at league.

He is not he has a decent laning phase because he can push lane very fast, if you try to fight him he has about 5 minions and 2-3 turrets and  you only have yourself. However, this makes him vulnerable to gank unless you just go back to your tower after each wave in which case, you won't be ahead by any means. when jungler ganks, who normally has 1 cc/dash/high damage ability, combine with mid, if they have 2/3 of their health, they can kill heimer before his turrets kill them. In team fights heimer heavily rely on fighting within his turret range, which is considerably hard since enemy adc can kill turrets very easily and thats about 1/3 of his damage gone. His ult turret isn't great either as it require too much time to deal enough damage to matter.

He punishes you for poor positioning and over committing ,  people often underestimate the sustained damage from his turrets , while heimer himself has reasonable burst and cc depending on which skill he chooses to use his ult on.  Also many people want to play burst assassins these days , which are generally poor at clearing minion waves , while heimer is a very very strong lane pusher.   Making poor choices is common at lower levels of play ,thus heimer can be extremely effective.

Heimerdinger will dominate early game, but late game he has very low scaling so he won't be as strong as the average champion and can easily be beaten.
Also since Heimerdinger is rarely played some Summoners may not know ow to beat him.
